title: Flames (Action, 1932) Johnny Mack Brown, Noel Francis | Movie, Subtitles

sources.title: Flames (Action, 1932) Johnny Mack Brown, Noel Francis | Movie, Subtitles
sources.description:
Brown is a confident young firefighter. He and his buddy become interested in two girls, after saving their cat. He then fights a fire in the apartment building next door to his new girlfriend.

Original title: Flames (1932) AKA: Fire Alarm / Fatal Alarm

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/NZdxOdfh2SQ


This film is subtitled in many languages.

Director: Karl Brown
Writers: Karl Brown, Lee Chadwick 
Stars: Johnny Mack Brown, George Cooper, Noel Francis 
Genres: Classics, Drama, Action, Adventure, Romance


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
01:24 Firefighters rescue a cat stuck in a tree, avoid unnecessary calls, and watch a movie.
07:25 A wealthy man offers a young woman a private secretary job, leading to potential complications and misunderstandings.
15:57 Drama unfolds in an office setting as relationships and tensions rise between characters.
19:02 A chaotic scene unfolds as characters navigate through a series of events, including a fire and a mysterious disappearance.
29:23 A dramatic scene unfolds at a burning building, where characters navigate through danger and emotions.
36:16 Unexpected visitor interrupts a conversation, leading to confusion and misunderstandings.
42:22 Drama unfolds as Garson causes trouble by invading Burke's home, leading to a confrontation.
46:18 Deception, threats, and a rescue plan unfold in a small town involving Garson, Gertie, Pat, and Charlie.
51:33 A thrilling rescue mission unfolds as a group of individuals work together to save lives during a dangerous situation.
